attributes.title: *** LAG, BATTERY DRAIN, AND PHONE MESS UPS ***
attributes.review: This app makes me so sad ! I cannot believe this is a legitimate app. The graphics were very low and it messed up my phone for whatever reason ! It changed my WiFi on and off and drained my battery like no other. I highly DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP. You must have the. IPhone27 to even work this app because it is so confusing and constantly logged me out multiple times and sometimes would not let me in for days. I am VERY disappointed that OUR PRESIDENT would even allow an app like this to be in his name. Not to mention the constant lag I had gotten while using it ON AND OFF THE APP. Numerous apps of mine like Fox News, Facebook, and Yubo were affected by this. Please fix this. I would like to use this app without completing ruining my phone.
